      • isCastling

        public boolean isCastling(java.lang.String curr,
                          java.lang.String next)
        returns true if king is preparing for a valid castling maneuver
        Parameters:
        curr - String ID for gamepieces current location
        next - String ID for gamepieces next location
        Returns:
        true or false depending on placement of pieces
        See Also:
        Board.Board(), Board.transRow(char), Board.transCol(char)

      • tryMove

        public boolean tryMove(java.lang.String curr,
                       java.lang.String next)
        return true if the path from curr to next is not blocked by other pieces
        Overrides:
        tryMove in class GamePiece
        Parameters:
        curr - String ID for gamepieces current location
        next - String ID for gamepieces next location
        Returns:
        true or false depending on openness of path
        See Also:
        GamePiece.isValidLoc(String, String), GamePiece.isPathClear(String, String), GamePiece.isDiag(String, String), GamePiece.isOneSpace(String, String), GamePiece.isUp(String, String), GamePiece.isDown(String, String), GamePiece.isHoriz(String, String)
